name: The Daily Games (November 2020)
description:
I made one game each day for a month (around 90 minutes per game). Most of them work, and several of them are fun!

I made them all in Phaser (thanks, Phaser) and spent 29 of the days lamenting that I was out of ideas.

P.S. The text is blurry in Chrome but looks mostly fine in Firefox. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
